# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I propose a price of $9,500 for this item. This offer is tailored to provide you with a competitive advantage while ensuring you receive a high-quality product that meets your requirements. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
